TEXT.TITLE: ASAMERA <ASM> COMPLETES REFINERY SALE
TEXT.BODY: Asamera Inc said wholly owned Asamera Oil (U.S.) Inc concluded the 25.25 mln U.S. dlr sale of its Denver refinery to Total Petroleum North America Ltd. In addition, Total is purchasing crude oil and refined product inventories at market value, Asamera said. Reuter
